name: Sarah Clinch
content: Sarah Clinch - Research Explorer The University of Manchester Sarah Clinch Dr Senior Lecturer in Computer Science, Human Computer Systems https://orcid.org/0000-0002-9305-4774 Emailsarah.clinchmanchester.acukWebsitehttp://sclinch.com Accepting PhD StudentsPhD projectsI'm currently looking for students to work on projects related to: * Augmentation and manipulation of human memory, particularly episodic memory, through technology intervention * Mobile sensing and intervention for aphantasia/hyperphantasia * Evaluation measures human memory augmentations * Queer HCI * Theory in HCI / Ubiquitous computingI do NOT supervise projects with any meaningful machine learning / AI element. Personal profile Expertise related to UN Sustainable Development Goals In 2015, UN member states agreed to 17 global Sustainable Development Goals (SDGs) to end poverty, protect the planet and ensure prosperity for all. This person’s work contributes towards the following SDG(s): Research Beacons, Institutes and PlatformsDigital Futures Fingerprint Dive into the research topics where Sarah Clinch is active. These topic labels come from the works of this person.
